comment.caption: Mary Jane Truman, Harriet Young, and Harrison Young on the Grandview farm
comment.note: Left to Right: Mary Jane Truman; Harriet Young, her great grandmother; and Uncle Harrison Young on the Grandview farm, by a corral. Caption says "Grandma, Uncle Harrison, and Lovey Mary." One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
